statements: SELECT * FROM air_quality_measurements
SELECT measurement_id, measurement_value FROM air_quality_measurements
SELECT DISTINCT station_id FROM air_quality_measurements
SELECT * FROM air_quality_measurements ORDER BY measurement_time DESC
SELECT AVG(measurement_value) FROM air_quality_measurements
SELECT * FROM air_quality_measurements;
SELECT measurement_id, station_id, measurement_value FROM air_quality_measurements WHERE measurement_value > 50;
SELECT station_id, AVG(measurement_value) AS avg_measurement_value FROM air_quality_measurements GROUP BY station_id;
SELECT measurement_time, measurement_value FROM air_quality_measurements ORDER BY measurement_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM air_quality_measurements WHERE station_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND measurement_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM monitoring_stations;
SELECT station_id, station_name FROM monitoring_stations ORDER BY station_name ASC;
SELECT station_name, station_id FROM monitoring_stations WHERE station_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM air_quality_measurements WHERE pm_2_5_level > 15;
SELECT station_id, pm_2_5_level, pm_10_level FROM air_quality_measurements WHERE station_id = 1 ORDER BY pm_2_5_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM monitoring_stations;
SELECT station_id, station_name FROM monitoring_stations ORDER BY station_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM air_quality_measurements WHERE pm_2_5_level > 20 AND carbon_monoxide_level < 10;
SELECT station_name, pm_2_5_level, ozone_level FROM monitoring_stations as ms JOIN air_quality_measurements as aqm ON ms.station_id = aqm.station_id WHERE pm_2_5_level > 15;

SELECT station_name, measurement_datetime FROM monitoring_stations as ms LEFT JOIN air_quality_measurements as aqm ON ms.station_id = aqm.station_id WHERE aqm.pm_2_5_level > 10 ORDER BY measurement_datetime DESC;
SELECT * FROM MonitoringStations;
SELECT station_id, station_name FROM MonitoringStations WHERE station_id = 1;
SELECT station_name, location FROM MonitoringStations ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM AirQualityMeasurements WHERE measurement_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT measurement_id, particulate_matter, pollutant_level FROM AirQualityMeasurements ORDER BY particulate_matter DESC;
SELECT * FROM MonitoringStations ORDER BY station_name DESC;
SELECT station_name, location FROM MonitoringStations WHERE location='City A';

SELECT station_name, measurement_date, particulate_matter FROM MonitoringStations JOIN AirQualityMeasurements ON MonitoringStations.station_id = AirQualityMeasurements.station_id WHERE particulate_matter > 50;
SELECT sensor_type, measurement_value FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_type='Temperature Sensor' ORDER BY measurement_value DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM MonitoringStations JOIN SensorData ON MonitoringStations.station_id = SensorData.station_id WHERE measurement_value < 20 AND pollutant_level='High';
SELECT * FROM monitoring_stations;
SELECT station_name FROM monitoring_stations WHERE station_id = 1;
SELECT city, country FROM locations WHERE station_id = 2;
SELECT datetime, pm25_level, pm10_level FROM air_quality_measurements WHERE station_id = 3;
SELECT sensor_type, sensor_model FROM sensors WHERE station_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM monitoring_stations;
SELECT station_id, station_name FROM monitoring_stations ORDER BY station_name DESC;
SELECT datetime, pm25_level FROM air_quality_measurements WHERE pm25_level > 50;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_model FROM sensors WHERE station_id = 3;
SELECT city, country FROM locations WHERE station_id = 1 AND city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM monitoring_stations;
SELECT station_name, location FROM monitoring_stations;
SELECT measurement_id, pm25_level, temperature FROM air_quality_measurements;
SELECT * FROM pollutants WHERE pollutant_id = 1;
SELECT log_id, measured_value FROM measurement_logs ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM monitoring_stations;
SELECT station_name, location FROM monitoring_stations WHERE station_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM air_quality_measurements ORDER BY measurement_date DESC;
SELECT station_id, pm25_level, pm10_level FROM air_quality_measurements WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 50;

SELECT pollutants.pollutant_name, measurement_logs.measured_value FROM pollutants JOIN measurement_logs ON pollutants.pollutant_id = measurement_logs.unit_id WHERE measured_value > 50 ORDER BY measured_value DESC;
